titleStmt.title: W. C. Ireland et al. to James F. Robinson
CWG1302

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1862-1863

body.p:
To his Excellency the
Governor of Ky

The undersigned would respectfully recommend the Hon Albert A Curtis, as a gentlemen every way qualified to fill the office of agent, to receive monies from soldiers in service and transmit the same to their families -- His appointment would give great satisfaction.

W. C. Ireland
F. L. Cleveland
Granville Pearl
Thos J. Frazier
Harrison Cockrill
H S Powell
C. F. Burnam
Alex Lusk
Alex T White
D. W. Johns
E B Bacheller
W. C. Gilliss
Alhijah Gilbert
